items.name: Spring Roll
items.description: Deep-fried wrapped rice paper rolls stuffed with vegetables and bean thread noodles (clear noodles) served piping hot with plum sauce.

items.name: Roti
items.description: Our famous Thai style pan toasted roti flat bread served with flavorful dipping sauce and a side of cucumber salad.

items.name: Shrimp Fresh Rolls
items.description: Fresh rice paper rolls stuffed with shrimps, cucumber, lettuce, carrots, onion, and cilantro. Served with delightful dipping sauce.

items.name: Chicken Satay Fresh Rolls
items.description: Fresh spring rolls stuffed with chicken satay, cucumber, lettuce, carrots, onions and fresh cilantro wrapped in rice paper served with delightful dipping sauce.

items.name: Roasted Duck Fresh Rolls
items.description: Fresh spring rolls stuffed with roasted duck, cucumber, lettuce, carrots, onions and fresh cilantro wrapped in rice paper served with delightful dipping sauce.

items.name: Fish Cakes
items.description: Deep-fried traditional Thai style fish cakes seasoned with battered fish fillets and red curry paste mixed with chopped green bean and kaffir lime leaves.  Served with cucumber salad and crushed peanuts dipping sauce.

items.name: Chicken or Beef Satay
items.description: Grilled skewered chicken or beef marinated with Thai herbs and spices. Served with peanut sauce and cucumber salad on the side.

items.name: Thai Samosa
items.description: Deep-fried crispy rice flour paper stuffed with assorted potatoes, onions, peas, and carrots; seasoned with curry powder.

items.name: Coconut Prawns
items.description: Deep-fried prawns coated with seasoned Thai herbs, crisp shredded coconut, and roasted peanuts. Served with tangy homemade dipping sauce.

items.name: Mieng Kum
items.description: A traditional Thai snack consists of fresh lettuces topped with dried shrimps, roasted coconut flakes, assorted Thai herbs and roasted peanuts.  Served with homemade dipping sauce.

items.name: Chili Crusted Calamari
items.description: Your choice of deep-fried or grilled calamari served with a homemade dipping sauce.

items.name: Hot Sticky Wings
items.description: Fried chicken wings served with chef's special dipping sauce.

items.name: Angel Wings
items.description: Deep-fried de-boned chicken wings stuffed with ground chicken and vegetables. Served with cucumber salad & crushed peanut.

items.name: Lamb
items.description: Choose one from the following taste choices:

items.name: Prawns Curry
items.description: Prawns, red curry paste, coconut milk, pineapples, bell peppers, tomatoes, basil

items.name: Grilled Scallops
items.description: Choose one from the following taste choices:

items.name: Prawns or Squids
items.description: Sautéed prawns or squids with a choice of the following tastes:

items.name: BASA Fillet
items.description: BASA Fillet with a choice of the following tastes:

items.name: Salmon Fillet
items.description: Choose one from the following taste choices:

items.name: Tamarind Prawns
items.description: Grilled prawns served with tamarind sauce, snap peas, spinach, and cilantro.

items.name: Panang Curry Seafood
items.description: Combination seafood cooked in panang curry paste, coconut milk, zucchinis, bell peppers, and basil.

items.name: Chili Seafood
items.description: Sautéed combination seafood, zucchinis, bell peppers, chili, garlic, basil

items.name: Fried Tilapia
items.description: Tilapia Fillet, mushrooms, onion, baby corns, and bell peppers topped with a choice of hot & sour sauce or chili sauce.

items.name: Sea-bass
items.description: Choose one from the following taste choices:

items.name: Cashew Chicken
items.description: Sautéed chicken breast, cashew nuts, bell peppers, onions, chili, and fried chili with roasted chili sauce.

items.name: Ginger Chicken
items.description: Sautéed chicken breast, straw mushrooms, bell peppers, onion, celery, fresh ginger, and garlic.

items.name: Special Mango Chicken
items.description: Sautéed chicken breast, fresh mango, cashew nuts, bell peppers, and onions with roasted chili sauce.

items.name: Special Mango Prawns
items.description: Sautéed prawns, fresh mango, cashew nuts, bell peppers, and onions with roasted chili sauce.

items.name: Garlic Chicken or Pork
items.description: Sautéed chicken breast or pork, garlic, black pepper, cilantro

items.name: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken
items.description: Sautéed minced chicken, bell peppers, garlic, chili, and basil.

items.name: Chili Pork with Green Beans
items.description: Sautéed pork, garlic and green beans with roasted red curry sauce.

items.name: Spicy Eggplants
items.description: Sautéed minced chicken or pork, eggplants, bell peppers, soybean, garlic, chili, and basil.

items.name: Spicy Catfish
items.description: Sautéed catfish with roasted red curry sauce, bell peppers and basil.

items.name: Three Companies
items.description: Sautéed prawns, squids, chicken, bean thread noodles (clear noodles), cabbages, broccoli, carrots, celery, and onions.

items.name: Drunken Lemongrass Chicken
items.description: Grilled chicken breast, asparagus and mixed vegetables with spicy lemongrass sauce.

items.name: Spicy Hot Pepper Chicken
items.description: Sautéed chicken, baby corns, mushrooms, onion, garlic, bell pepper, and jalapeno.

items.name: Seafood and Vegetables Soup
items.description: Spices herbal soup with cabbages, baby corns, mushrooms, onion, carrots, celery, cilantro and combination seafood.

items.name: Tom Kha Soup (Coconut Milk Soup)
items.description: Spices herbal coconut milk soup with baby corns, mushrooms, cilantro your choice of meat or seafood.

items.name: Tom Yum Soup (Hot & Sour Soup)
items.description: Spices herbal hot & sour soup with lemongrass, mushrooms and your choice of meat or seafood.

items.name: Bangkok Salad (Yum Yai)
items.description: Assorted vegetables, sliced chicken and sliced hard broiled egg mixed in light salad dressing topped with roasted ground peanut.

items.name: Som-Tum (Green Papaya Salad)
items.description: Shredded green papaya with green beans, carrots, tomatoes, roasted peanut, fresh garlic, Thai chili, and fresh lime juice.

items.name: BBQ Beef Salad
items.description: Grilled beef with Thai herbs and roasted chili mixed in spicy lime dressing.

items.name: Larb Salad
items.description: Your choice of minced chicken or minced pork with fresh cilantro, mint leaves, onions, and ground-roasted rice in spicy lime dressing.

items.name: Bean-Thread Noodle Salad
items.description: Bean-thread noodles (clear noodles) with your choice of minced chicken or minced pork, shrimps, and squids in spicy lime dressing.

items.name: Eggplant Salad
items.description: Chinese eggplant with shrimps, minced chicken, onions and fresh cilantro in spicy dressing.

items.name: Crispy Tilapia Salad
items.description: Minced deep-fried tilapia with mango, onion, ginger, cilantro, and cashew nuts mixed in spicy lime dressing

items.name: Mango & Prawns Salad
items.description: Grilled prawns with fresh mango, onions, fresh cilantro, and cashew nuts in spicy lime dressing.

items.name: 4-Star Hot & Sour
items.description: BBQ pork or chicken topped with garlic, onion, and cilantro mixed in spicy lime sauce.

items.name: Tiger Cry
items.description: Grilled New York steak served with steamed vegetables and spicy dipping sauce.

items.name: BBQ Honey Beef
items.description: Grilled marinated beef; served with crushed peanut tangy plum sauce.

items.name: BBQ Honey Pork
items.description: Grilled pork marinated with Thai spices; served with crushed peanut tangy plum sauce.

items.name: BBQ Chicken
items.description: Grilled whole chicken marinated with Thai spices; served with crushed peanut tangy plum sauce.

items.name: Mus-Sa-Mun Curry
items.description: Mild red curry paste, coconut milk, potatoes, carrots, pineapples, peanuts, onions

items.name: Red Curry
items.description: Red curry paste, coconut milk, bamboo shoots, bell papers, sweet basil

items.name: Forest Curry (no coconut milk)
items.description: Red curry paste, bamboo shoots, green beans, zucchini, mushrooms, baby corns, galangal, young green peppers, basil. *cooked without coconut milk.

items.name: Pa-Nang Curry
items.description: Mild red curry paste, coconut milk, zucchini, bell papers, basil

items.name: Green Curry
items.description: Green curry paste, coconut milk, bamboo shoots, peas, bell papers, basil

items.name: Yellow Curry
items.description: Yellow curry paste, coconut milk, potatoes, carrots, onion

items.name: Pumpkin Curry
items.description: Red curry paste, coconut milk, pumpkins, basil

items.name: Pineapple Curry
items.description: Red curry paste, coconut milk, pineapples, bell peppers, tomatoes, peas, and basil.

items.name: Super Green Curry
items.description: Green curry paste, coconut milk, kale, spinach, green beans, broccoli, bell papers, carrots, and basil.

items.name: Thai Fried Rice
items.description: Fried rice with egg.

items.name: Spicy Fried Rice
items.description: Fried rice, chili, garlic, bell peppers, and basil.

items.name: Curry Fried Rice
items.description: Fried rice with a choice of green or red curry flavored and green beans

items.name: House Special Fried Rice
items.description: Fried rice, chicken, prawns, pineapples, peas, carrots, cashew nuts, and onions.

items.name: Pad Thai
items.description: A famous Thai street food, pan-fried rice noodles with egg, bean sprouts, and green onions. Garnished with crushed peanuts.

items.name: Pad See-Ew
items.description: Pan-fried wide rice noodles with egg, and fresh broccoli.

items.name: Pad Kee-Maow
items.description: Pan-fried wide rice noodles with garlic, fresh chili, bell peppers, tomatoes, and basil.
